summary: The Healthcare Extension and Accessibility for Developmentally disabled and Underserved Population Act of 2025 (HEADs UP Act of 2025) aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve healthcare services for individuals with developmental disabilities. The bill seeks to include this population within special medically underserved populations, define the term, authorize grants for specialized services (including dental care), and allocate funding. It also amends provisions related to health professional shortage areas to include individuals with developmental disabilities.
